Reference

Overview

table.express-package

Bindings to use dplyr's verbs with data.table

R6 Classes

ExprBuilder

Frame expression builder

Verbs

Data manipulation verbs

arrange(<ExprBuilder>)

Arrange rows

filter(<ExprBuilder>)

Filter rows

group_by(<ExprBuilder>)

Group by clause

mutate(<ExprBuilder>)

Add or update columns

order_by()

Order by clause

select(<ExprBuilder>)

Select clause

transmute(<ExprBuilder>)

Alias for select

where()

Where clause

mutate_sd()

Mutate subset of data

transmute_sd()

Transmute subset of data

frame_append()

Append expressions to the frame

Expression Delimiters

Delimiters between expressions and data.tables

start_expr()

Start expression

chain()

Chain

end_expr()

End and evaluate expression
